name: Vacation Detective
description:
Game made for GBJAM9...
...but it didn't quite make it.

Play as Dick, a hardboiled private eye on vacation as he investigates the mysterious death of his recent client Vanna.

Next to her body lies a list of names...
Yorck...Slick...Knick...Erick...Amick...
Are they connected?
What do they know?

There's only one way to find out: ask questions!

Controls:
[ X ] - Confirm
[ Z ] - Cancel
[ Arrow Keys ] - Select
